description: The Tata Nexon has 1 Diesel Engine and 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Diesel engine is 1497 cc while the Petrol engine is 1199 cc . It is available with the Manual & Automatic transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Nexon has a mileage of 17.0 to 21.5 kmpl. The Nexon is a 5 seater suv and has length of 3993mm, width of 1811mm and a wheelbase of 2498mm.
name: Nexon
